item.title: About Me
item.description: (GitHub-Flavored) Markdown Editor Basic useful feature list: Ctrl+S / Cmd+S to save the file Ctrl+Shift+S / Cmd+Shift+S to choose to save as Markdown or HTML Drag and drop a file into here to load it File contents are saved in the URL so you can share files I’m no good at writing sample / filler text, so go write something yourself. Look, a list! foo bar baz And here’s some code!
